title: Kung Fu Panda Toddler Po Costume
features: COSTUME INCLUDES: This Toddler Kids Kung Fu Panda Costume comes with a Po panda jumpsuit and a Po panda hood headpiece.

FROM FUN COSTUMES: We're all about costumes and we're proud to offer a selection that features the most popular characters from TV, movies, and more. We love animated movies as much as you do, which is why we were excited to team up with Dreamworks Animation to produce this Kung Fu Panda Costume for toddlers!

AUTHENTIC DESIGN: We designed this Kung Fu Panda outfit to recreate the outfit of Po, the lead character of Kung Fu Panda. The costume has great character details that are true to the movie like patchwork style pants, Po's face on the hood, and extra fiberfill stuffing to complete the round look of a true panda.

QUALITY COSTUME: Some costume makers skimp on quality but not us! We use select fabrics and quality construction methods on each and every one of our Halloween costumes. This Po costume for kids features faux fur fabrics for animal action fun and it's crafted with durability that will last through all of the costume adventures.
description: The Fun Costumes Kung Fu Panda Po Costume for Toddlers Let your little one experience Kung Fu adventures with their Halloween Costume when they have this Kung Fu Panda Costume! Part of our line of exclusive movie costumes, this outfit is officially licensed by Dreamworks Animation and ready to transform your child into the hero of the movie Po! Product Design: Our Kung Fu Panda Po outfit for kids includes a jumpsuit and hood made with faux fur and jersey knit fabrics. The suit features a fiberfill stuffed roll for character effect and tail attached in back. The hood fits with a hook and loop fastener under the chin and the nose, ears, and eyes add Po's face to the outfit. Product Details: 100% polyester faux fur, jersey knit, fiberfill Jumpsuit has hook & loop fastener at center back Shirt portion of jumpsuit is faux fur, pants portion is jersey knit Fiberfill-stuffed roll at dropped waist Stuffed spherical tail sewn to back of suit Hood has hook & loop fastener on chin strap Hood has faux fur outer shell, foam-backed jersey lining, stuffing between shell & lining for shape Top of hood has stuffed nose & ears, embroidered eyes Dreamworks officially licensed Size Chart: 18MO: Chest=26"; Sleeve Length=12"; Waist=27 1/2"; Torso=18"; Jumpsuit Length=23 1/2" 2T: Chest=28"; Sleeve Length=14"; Waist=30"; Torso=20"; Jumpsuit Length=28 1/2" 4T: Chest=30"; Sleeve Length=16"; Waist=33"; Torso=22"; Jumpsuit Length=33 1/2" About Us: Fun Costumes are exclusively made by us and begin with passion, teamwork, and industry expertise decades in the making. Our products are proof that with the right people even a simple idea can grow into something incredible. We started in a small garage in Minnesota, providing costumes to our local community, and now we're creating costumes for people all around the world. - Jumpsuit - Hood
